Mike Pence decision "major coup" for RGA- David Catanese: Mike Pence decision "major coup" for RGA Indiana Rep. Mike Pence isn't running for president, which means a gubernatorial run is almost inevitable. Mike Pence won't formally announce his gubernatorial campaign on Thursday-a state law prohibits announced candidates from raising money during the state legislative session, scheduled to end April-but he fully intends to run for governor, a source with knowledge of his thinking told POLITICO.
